We’re collaborating with @wearerangde, a peer-to-peer lending platform that supports women entrepreneurs across India. From Rajasthan to Assam to Bihar, women are building incredible businesses with the help of small investments from people like you and me. 🌱

From this month onwards, 10% of Adah’s sales will be invested in women-led businesses through Rang De.

👉 And here’s the best part: This is not a donation. It’s an investment, you get your money back with interest.

If you’d like to support too, head to rangde.in and register as an Investor (not investee) so you can start lending directly to women creating change. 💛

Because when you shop at Adah or when you invest through Rang De you’re helping women rewrite their stories across regions you’ve never even been to. 🌍

#InvestInWomen #AdahByLeesha #RangDe #grassrootchanges

We’re collaborating with @wearerangde, a peer-to-peer lending platform that supports women entrepreneurs across India. From Rajasthan to Assam to Bihar, women are building incredible businesses with the help of small investments from people like you and me. 🌱

From this month onwards, 10% of Adah’s sales will be invested in women-led businesses through Rang De.

👉 And here’s the best part: This is not a donation. It’s an investment, you get your money back with interest.

If you’d like to support too, head to rangde.in and register as an Investor (not investee) so you can start lending directly to women creating change. 💛

Because when you shop at Adah or when you invest through Rang De you’re helping women rewrite their stories across regions you’ve never even been to. 🌍

In an age of speed, we chose slow.

At Aryati, we find beauty in the pause—in the gentle hum of a sewing machine and the honest feel of natural fabric. Our work is a quiet rebellion against the transient nature of trends.
